page.title: 06COMPUTER AND GAMES
page.content:
The class has a{Spectrum 48k}computer. We have a{Cub}monitor and a printer. We have learning games and games to have fun with. We have got{Spelling {Alphaswop, Shoping, Time and many {other programs.Mr White,}our teacher, makes up programs for us to do in class. When it is my turn I get out my log book and do a program. When it is raining the boys take games to school such as{"Hunchy"}and{"Manic {Miner". We enjoy having a computer in school because it is good to use and you learn things. The infant class is getting a small talking computer to do work with. It will teach them to count, spell,tell the time and other things.
{STUART WISEMAN ( Age 8)}
